item.title: Montréal : Warning
item.description:
Louis-H.-La Fontaine Tunnel
Contraflow traffic (north tube), 2 lanes northbound and only one southbound.
Northbound lanes width reduced to 3.2 m. Cause: tunnel repair.

Heavy vehicles:
Coming from A-20 West/A-25 North (towards Montréal), right lane MANDATORY from De Mortagne Blvd.

Coming from A-25 South (towards Longueuil), right lane PROHIBITED from Sherbrooke Street.

item.title: A-10 : Road condition
item.description: From Île des Soeurs to Samuel-De Champlain Bridge Rive-Sud | Bare and Dry | Good

item.title: R-112 : Roadwork
item.description: Between Montréal and Saint-Lambert On Victoria Bridge ----- During the week during rush hours (Monday to Friday), BOTH lanes in ONE direction only: - From 5 a.m. to 9 a.m., towards Montreal (WESTBOUND) - From 3 p.m. to 7:15 p.m., towards the South Shore (EASTBOUND) Outside these hours, one lane open in each direction ----- NOTE: heavy trucks forbidden, at all times

item.title: R-136 : Roadwork
item.description: In Montréal Autoroute Ville-Marie In the Viger Tunnel WESTBOUND Between the beginning of the highway (at Panet Street) and the Sanguinet Street entrance Closure of 1 lane out of 4, at all times Works: renovation of the Saint-Urbain Street overpass

item.title: R-136 : Roadwork
item.description: In Montreal Ville-Marie Highway EASTBOUND In the Ville-Marie Tunnel From the start of the tunnel to exit 6 (Berri Street) Closure of 2 lanes out of 5, at all times Works: renovation of the Ville-Marie and Viger Tunnels

item.title: A-25 : Roadwork
item.description: In Montreal (Mercier-Hochelaga-Maisonneuve) Southbound Exit 4 (Souligny Avenue, Downtown) Lane width: 4.5 meters Works: repair project of Louis-Hippolyte-La Fontaine Tunnel

item.title: A-25 : Roadwork
item.description: In Montreal and in Longueuil SOUTHBOUND Between exit 4 (downtown) and De l'Île-Charron St. entrance, including the tunnel Complete closure From 11 pm Friday to 8 am Saturday From 11 pm Saturday to 9 am Sunday Detour: via De Boucherville, Hochelaga, Dickson S/B St., Notre-Dame St., Papineau Ave. and Jacques-Cartier Bridge Trucks (height more than 4.25 m): via Dickson St. N/B, Hochelaga St., De l'Assomption Blvd., Sherbrooke St., Pie-IX Blvd. Works: major repair of the Louis-H.-La Fontaine Tunnel

item.title: A-25 : Roadwork
item.description: In Montreal (Anjou) Southbound Between exit 6 (rue Beaubien) and the Louis-Hippolyte-La Fontaine Tunnel Trucks prohibited from driving in the right lane at all times except for exits Works: major repair project for the Louis-Hippolyte-La Fontaine Tunnel

item.title: A-40 : Roadwork
item.description: In Montreal Anjou Interchange On the ramp leading from A-40 WEST (exit 80-S) to A-25 SOUTH / Tunnel Channeling the track Closure of exit 6 (Beaubien Street, Yves-Prévost Boulevard) at all times for users coming from A-40 WEST Detour: via A-25 SOUTH and exit 5 towards Sherbrooke Street and Langelier Boulevard Track width reduced to 4.5 metres Works: renovation of the Louis-H.-La Fontaine Tunnel

item.title: A-40 : Roadwork
item.description: In Montreal Anjou Interchange Closure of the ramp leading from the A-40 WEST to the A-25 SOUTH / tunnel From Friday 11 p.m. to Saturday 8 a.m. Detour: continue and turn around at exit 78 (Langelier Boulevard) Works: Louis-H.-La Fontaine Tunnel repair
